    About This Site

    Personal website for Siena Guerrero. Digital designer, tinkerer, and lover of coding. Computer Science Major at Harvey Mudd College. Learn more about my story.

    Hosted on Github Pages, maintained on Github. If you find an error on this site, let me know by submitting an issue.
